title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.2 - Purchasers must be licensed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.2 - Purchasers must be licensed

State Regulations

No licensee shall sell, offer for sale, agree to sell or
deliver in this State, to a retail licensee holding a license pursuant to
section
63
or
64
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, any
liquor described and identified by warehouse receipts unless such licensee is
the holder of a license pursuant to section
61
or
62
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, except as hereinafter provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
64.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
